Name: Tre Martini
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (expressed and discarded) & speared fresh raspberry or float dehydrated raspberry.
Review: A simple, well-balanced, fruity drink, laced with rum.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Asa Nevestveit at Sosho bar in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Tre Martini contains 200 calories
